name: pagespace-posts
description: Useful for creating blogs and newsfeeds from pages
author: Phil Mander

root.title: Root page
root.description: Blog posts will be aggregated from child pages of this page

expiry.title: Expiry
expiry.description: An expiry greater than 0 will display posts belonging to pages with a future expiry date, less than 0 will display posts belonging to pages with a past expiry date

postWrapperClass.title: CSS wrapper class for each post

includeLimit.title: Include limit
includeLimit.description: The number of includes to show for each aggregtated post. A value less than 0 will display all includes.

defaultTags.title: Default tags
defaultTags.description: A comma delimted list of tags to filter pages by, if none are given in the page request

noPostsHtml.title: No posts
noPostsHtml.description: HTML to display if there are no posts.
